articles.description: Osteoporosis is more common in women than men, but it affects millions of men every year. Learn more about the unique risk factors for osteoporosis in men.

Osteoporosis affects about 1 in 20 men over age 50. Osteoporosis in men is more likely to be caused by something other than aging, such as certain medications.
